definitions.definition: To move or act quickly or suddenly.
To measure the distance and direction to (a point).
To inject a drug (such as heroin) intravenously.
To protrude; to jut; to project; to extend.
definitions.example: The land shoots into a promontory.

definitions.definition: To plane straight; to fit by planing.
To variegate as if by sprinkling or intermingling; to color in spots or patches.W
An instance of shooting with a gun or other weapon.
definitions.example: Police are hunting the people who carried out the shootings last week.

definitions.definition: The sport or activity of firing a gun or other weapon.
definitions.example: I take part in shooting at the local archery club.

definitions.definition: A district in which people have the right to kill game with firearms.
The act of one who, or that which, shoots.
definitions.example: the shooting of rays of light
